verses.verse: "And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H7220>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal;<s%>

and I shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> you <S%H7725>around,<s%> <S%H8338>drive<s%> you on, <S%H5927>take<s%> you up from the <S%H3411>remotest<s%> <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> your <S%H7198>bow<s%> from your <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5307>dash<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> from your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"You shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H102>troops,<s%> and the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with you; I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you as <S%H402>food<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>kind<s%> of <S%H5861>predatory<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> and <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
"You will <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field;<s%> for it is I who have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> upon <S%H4031>Magog<s%> and those who <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> in <S%H983>safety;<s%> and they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> I shall <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and I shall not let My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H2490>profaned<s%> <S%H5750>anymore.<s%> And the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> it is <S%H935>coming<s%> and it shall be <S%H1961>done,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%> "That is the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

"Then those who <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and <S%H1197>make<s%> <S%H1197>fires<s%> with the <S%H5402>weapons<s%> and <S%H9610>burn<s%> [them,] both <S%H4043>shields<s%> and <S%H6793>bucklers,<s%> <S%H7198>bows<s%> and <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> <S%H4731>war<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4731>clubs<s%> and <S%H7420>spears<s%> and for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they will <S%H1197>make<s%> <S%H784>fires<s%> of them.

"And they will not <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> from the <S%H7704>field<s%> or <S%H2404>gather<s%> <S%H2404>firewood<s%> from the <S%H9194>forests,<s%> for they will <S%H1197>make<s%> <S%H784>fires<s%> with the <S%H5402>weapons;<s%> and they will <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7997>spoil<s%> of those who <S%H7997>despoiled<s%> them, and <S%H962>seize<s%> the <S%H962>plunder<s%> of those who <S%H962>plundered<s%> them," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about on that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> a <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H4725>ground<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H6926>east<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and it will <S%H2629>block<s%> <S%H2629>off<s%> the passers-by. So they will <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> and they will <S%H7121>call<s%> [it] the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of Hamon-gog.
"For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be <S%H6912>burying<s%> them in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"Even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H6912>bury<s%> [them;] and it will be to their <S%H8034>renown<s%> [on] the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H3513>glorify<s%> Myself," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"And they will <S%H914>set<s%> <S%H914>apart<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who will <S%H8548>constantly<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6912>burying<s%> those who were <S%H5674>passing<s%> <S%H5674>through,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> those <S%H3498>left<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>ground,<s%> in order to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> it. At the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> they will <S%H2713>make<s%> a <S%H2713>search.<s%>

"And as those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> and anyone <S%H7200>sees<s%> a man's <S%H6106>bone,<s%> then he will <S%H1129>set<s%> up a <S%H6725>marker<s%> by it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6912>buriers<s%> have <S%H6912>buried<s%> it in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of Hamon-gog.
"And <S%H1571>even<s%> [the] <S%H8034>name<s%> of [the] <S%H5892>city<s%> will be <S%H1997>Hamonah.<s%> So they will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>"'

"And as for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H559>'Speak<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>kind<s%> of <S%H6833>bird<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%>" <S%H6908>Assemble<s%> and <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H622>gather<s%> from <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%> to My <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am going to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> for you, as a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

"You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> as [though they were] <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> <S%H6260>goats,<s%> and <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

"So you will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> until you are <S%H7654>glutted,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> until you are <S%H7943>drunk,<s%> from My <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> for you.

"And you will be <S%H7646>glutted<s%> at My <S%H7979>table<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>charioteers,<s%> with <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H9202>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> My <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6213>executed,<s%> and My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>laid<s%> on them.
"And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1973>onward.<s%>

"And the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1540>went<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H4603>acted<s%> <S%H4603>treacherously<s%> against Me, and I <S%H5641>hid<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> from them; so I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
"According to their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> and according to their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> I <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with them, and I <S%H5641>hid<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> from them."' "

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> I shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and I shall be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"And they shall <S%H5375>forget<s%> their <S%H3639>disgrace<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4604>treachery<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H4603>perpetrated<s%> against Me, when they <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> on their [own] <S%H127>land<s%> with <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H2729>make<s%> them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

"When I <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from the <S%H776>lands<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies,<s%> then I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> through them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> because I made them <S%H1540>go<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and then <S%H3664>gathered<s%> them [again] to their own <S%H127>land;<s%> and I will <S%H3498>leave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of them <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer.<s%>

"And I will not <S%H5641>hide<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> from them <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%> for I shall have <S%H8210>poured<s%> out My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
